mapper.select: SELECT type_no typeNo , type_content typeContent FROM shopping_type WHERE parent_no = 0

WITH RECURSIVE cts AS ( SELECT type_no , type_content , parent_no , group_no , sequence , depth , createdate , cast(type_no as CHAR(100)) lvl FROM shopping_type WHERE parent_no = 0 UNION ALL SELECT st2.type_no , st2.type_content , st2.parent_no , st2.group_no , st2.sequence , st2.depth , st2.createdate , CONCAT(c.lvl, ',', st2.type_no) lvl FROM shopping_type st2 INNER JOIN cts c ON st2.parent_no = c.type_no ) SELECT type_no typeNo , type_content typeContent , parent_no parentNo , group_no groupNo , sequence , depth , createdate FROM cts WHERE parent_no = #{1} ORDER BY groupNo, lvl
